intent_atoms.description: Provide a DocumentLoadFailure state in DocumentSessionController to allow the SwiftUI app shell to react to unreadable files.
Display a DocumentLoadFailureBanner overlay in AppShellView with retry and "Open File…" controls that use controller APIs.
The banner must appear when a document load failure occurs.
Retry action clears the failure state and removes the banner.
Open File… action triggers file picker to open a new file.
The banner should automatically clear on retry.
DocumentLoadFailure state must always be available in DocumentSessionController.
Expose document load failure state and retry/dismissal affordances via a published state variable.

functional_units.name: DocumentLoadFailure State
functional_units.description: Represents a failure state in DocumentSessionController when a document cannot be loaded, exposing retry and dismissal options.

functional_units.name: DocumentLoadFailureBanner Overlay
functional_units.description: UI component displayed over AppShellView to inform users of load failures with actionable retry and Open File controls.

functional_units.name: Retry Action API
functional_units.description: Endpoint exposed by DocumentSessionController allowing the app shell to trigger a document reload after a failure.

functional_units.name: Open File Action API
functional_units.description: Endpoint exposed by DocumentSessionController enabling the user to select a new file when a load failure occurs.

functional_units.name: Automatic Banner Clearing Logic
functional_units.description: Behavior that clears the DocumentLoadFailureBanner automatically upon successful retry or dismissal.
